LanguageData.SiegearmorHelmet.label: 攻城头盔
LanguageData.SiegearmorHelmet.description: This is a helmet of the JE-342A7 "Dvergr (Dwarf)" siege armor. A rugged and trustworthy helmet to protect a soft, fleshy head from even the nastiest of enemies.
LanguageData.CCArmorHelmet.label: 近战头盔
LanguageData.CCArmorHelmet.description: The JE-257A1 "Einherjar" close combat armor is a modified version of "Dvergr" siege armor. Some of the thick armor plates have been removed so that high powered actuators and fast recharging shields could be installed.
LanguageData.Apparello_Proto.label: 精神力头盔
LanguageData.Apparello_Proto.description: A prototype of a very innovative headgear aimed to enhance synaptic reaction rates. It has some very unsavory side effects such as overbearing nervousness, ringing ears, strange background noises and/or voices.
LanguageData.Apparello_ProtoFin.label: 心灵冲击头盔
LanguageData.Apparello_ProtoFin.description: A very innovative headgear aimed to enhance synaptic reaction rates. It still has some very unsavory side effects although not as bad as before. Placing an advanced AI core on it seemed to work out most of the kinks. Unfortunately, the AI core also amplifies wearer psychic sensitivity, leaving them extremely vulnerable to psychic powers.
LanguageData.Apparello_Antsyhat.label: 反对者头盔
LanguageData.Apparello_Antsyhat.description: A very curious piece of technology, the final iteration of the prototype. Negates the awkward effects even further.
LanguageData.Apparello_Meffect.label: 灾难行动头盔
LanguageData.Apparello_Meffect.description: Most importantly airtight headgear designed for deep-space explorers to combat the hostile bacteria on uninhabitable planets.
LanguageData.Apparello_Hivehat.label: 母巢头盔
LanguageData.Apparello_Hivehat.description: Coupled with the Hive armor, the beastly visage of this helmet could very well cause that 'wet trousers' symptom in your foes.
LanguageData.Apparello_Hivehell.label: 蒸汽头盔
LanguageData.Apparello_Hivehell.description: Bulky headgear designed to match the steamhull. For some reason it reminds everyone of a choo choo train, huh.
LanguageData.Apparello_LPow.label: 轻型动力装甲头盔
LanguageData.Apparello_LPow.description: A part of powered light armor set, mostly used by light infantry.
LanguageData.Apparel_DoomHelmet.label: 毁灭者头盔
LanguageData.Apparel_DoomHelmet.description: The helmet part of power armor set. It is mostly used by heavy infantry.
LanguageData.Apparel_HellPowerArmorHelmet.label: 地狱头盔
LanguageData.Apparel_HellPowerArmorHelmet.description: The helmet part of power armor set. It is mostly used by heavy infantry.
LanguageData.ValkyrieHelmet.label: 瓦尔基里头盔
LanguageData.ValkyrieHelmet.description: A gorgeous helmet by the name of Valkyrie. Naturally attracts people around. Any men who attempt to wear this helmet are punishable by death.
